ml_flower module

The ml_flower module contains…

The MLFlower class

class kronos.ml_flower.MLFlower(client: mlflow.tracking.client.MlflowClient)

Class to manage all mlflow activities.

__init__(client: mlflow.tracking.client.MlflowClient) → None

Initialization method.

Parameters

client (MlflowClient) – The mlflow client used to track experiments and register models.

Returns

No return.

Example

ml_flower = MLFlower(client=client)
static end_run() → None

A static method to end an active MLflow run (if there is one).

Returns

No return.

get_experiment(experiment_path: str) → None

Method that try to create an experiment in a specific experiment path. If the experiment already exists, then the experiment is retrieved.

Parameters

experiment_path (str) – The experiment path to create/get.

Returns

No return.

static load_model(model_uri: str)

Static method to load a model in Python function format from a specific uri. Based on its flavor (e.g. ‘prophet’) the model is later reloaded using the specific loader module.

Parameters

model_uri (str) – The uri of the model to load.

Returns

  • The model flavor detected.

  • The model loaded.

promote_model(model_version_details: mlflow.entities.model_registry.model_version.ModelVersion, stage: str, archive_existing_versions: bool) → mlflow.entities.model_registry.model_version.ModelVersion

Method used to update the model version stage.

Parameters

  • model_version_details (ModelVersion) – Model version details of the model to promote.

  • stage (str) – Stage in which to promote the model.

  • archive_existing_versions (bool) – If this flag is set to True, all existing model versions in the stage will be automically moved to the “archived” stage.

Returns

(ModelVersion) Model version object promoted.

register_model(model_uri: str, model_name: str, timeout_s: int) → mlflow.entities.model_registry.model_version.ModelVersion

Create a new model version in model registry for the model files specified by model_uri.

Parameters

  • model_uri (str) – Uri of the model to register.

  • model_name (str) – Name of the registered model under which to create a new model version.

  • timeout_s (int) – Maximum number of seconds to wait for the model version to finish being created.

Returns

(ModelVersion) The ModelVersion object created, corresponding to the model registered.

set_model_tag(model_version_details: mlflow.entities.model_registry.model_version.ModelVersion, tag_key: str, tag_value: str) → None

Set a tag for a specific model version.

Parameters

  • model_version_details (ModelVersion) – Registered model version details.

  • tag_key (str) – Tag key to log.

  • tag_value (str) – Tag value to log.

Returns

No return.

start_run(run_name: str) → mlflow.tracking.fluent.ActiveRun

Start a new MLflow run with a specific run name.

Parameters

run_name (str) – Name of the run to start.

Returns

(mlflow.ActiveRun) object that acts as a context manager wrapping the run’s state.
